General.Name: Qingdao Citymedia Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao Citymedia Co,. Ltd. engages in the publication and distribution of books, periodicals, journals, and electronic audio-visual publications in China. It is also involved in the development and operation of media; and film and television, games, Internet, etc. The company was formerly known as Qingdao Soda Ash Industrial Company Limited and changed its name to Qingdao Citymedia Co,. Ltd. in September 2015. Qingdao Citymedia Co,. Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Qingdao, China.

1.Name: Ms. Cai Xia  Su
1.Title: CFO & Head of Financial Management Department
